snippet: It was perhaps inevitable, but worth noting all the same: Once Morgan Stanley completes its acquisition of Smith Barney, it will consign the venerable name to the financial industry's ash heap.
abstract: It was perhaps inevitable, but worth noting all the same: Once Morgan Stanley completes its acquisition of Smith Barney, it will consign the venerable name to the financial industry's ash heap.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Smith Barney Name to Join Wall Street's Dustbin
